mapper.sql: policy_no, endorse_no, addr_no, addr_no_ori, risk_no, amt, prem, prop_addr, zip_code, area_code, useprop_code, useprop_name, const_class, limit_no, limit, amt_flt, prem_flt, amt_fix, prem_fix, amt_typ, prem_typ, amt_ear, prem_ear, risk_flag, risk_name, limit_rate, limit_ori, flor_no, policy_dbgn, policy_dend, end_reason, mercno
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from fri_policy_dtl
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into fri_policy_dtl (policy_no, endorse_no, addr_no, addr_no_ori, risk_no, amt, prem, prop_addr, zip_code, area_code, useprop_code, useprop_name, const_class, limit_no, limit, amt_flt, prem_flt, amt_fix, prem_fix, amt_typ, prem_typ, amt_ear, prem_ear, risk_flag, risk_name, limit_rate, limit_ori, flor_no, policy_dbgn, policy_dend, end_reason, mercno) values (#{policyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endorseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addrNo,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{addrNoOri,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{riskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prem,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{propAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usepropCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usepropName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{constClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{limitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{limit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amtFlt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{premFlt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amtFix,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{premFix,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amtTyp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{premTyp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amtEar,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{premEar,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{riskFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{riskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{limitRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{limitOri,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{florNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{policyDbgn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{policyDend,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mercno,jdbcType=CHAR})

mapper.update:
update fri_policy_dtl
policy_no = #{record.policyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
endorse_no = #{record.endorseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addr_no = #{record.addrNo,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
addr_no_ori = #{record.addrNoOri,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
risk_no = #{record.riskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amt = #{record.amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
prem = #{record.prem,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
prop_addr = #{record.propAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zip_code = #{record.zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_code = #{record.areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
useprop_code = #{record.usepropCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
useprop_name = #{record.usepropName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
const_class = #{record.constClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
limit_no = #{record.limitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
limit = #{record.limit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
amt_flt = #{record.amtFlt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
prem_flt = #{record.premFlt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
amt_fix = #{record.amtFix,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
prem_fix = #{record.premFix,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
amt_typ = #{record.amtTyp,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
prem_typ = #{record.premTyp,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
amt_ear = #{record.amtEar,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
prem_ear = #{record.premEar,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
risk_flag = #{record.riskFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
risk_name = #{record.riskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
limit_rate = #{record.limitRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
limit_ori = #{record.limitOri,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
flor_no = #{record.florNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
policy_dbgn = #{record.policyDbgn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
policy_dend = #{record.policyDend,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_reason = #{record.endReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mercno = #{record.mercno,jdbcType=CHAR},

update fri_policy_dtl set policy_no = #{record.policyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endorse_no = #{record.endorseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addr_no = #{record.addrNo,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, addr_no_ori = #{record.addrNoOri,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, risk_no = #{record.riskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amt = #{record.amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, prem = #{record.prem,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, prop_addr = #{record.propAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zip_code = #{record.zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_code = #{record.areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, useprop_code = #{record.usepropCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, useprop_name = #{record.usepropName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, const_class = #{record.constClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, limit_no = #{record.limitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, limit = #{record.limit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, amt_flt = #{record.amtFlt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, prem_flt = #{record.premFlt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, amt_fix = #{record.amtFix,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, prem_fix = #{record.premFix,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, amt_typ = #{record.amtTyp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, prem_typ = #{record.premTyp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, amt_ear = #{record.amtEar,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, prem_ear = #{record.premEar,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, risk_flag = #{record.riskFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, risk_name = #{record.riskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, limit_rate = #{record.limitRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, limit_ori = #{record.limitOri,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, flor_no = #{record.florNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, policy_dbgn = #{record.policyDbgn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, policy_dend = #{record.policyDend,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_reason = #{record.endReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mercno = #{record.mercno,jdbcType=CHAR}

update fri_policy_dtl
addr_no_ori = #{addrNoOri,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
risk_no = #{riskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amt = #{amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
prem = #{prem,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
prop_addr = #{propAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zip_code = #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
useprop_code = #{usepropCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
useprop_name = #{usepropName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
const_class = #{constClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
limit_no = #{limitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
limit = #{limit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
amt_flt = #{amtFlt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
prem_flt = #{premFlt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
amt_fix = #{amtFix,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
prem_fix = #{premFix,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
amt_typ = #{amtTyp,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
prem_typ = #{premTyp,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
amt_ear = #{amtEar,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
prem_ear = #{premEar,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
risk_flag = #{riskFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
risk_name = #{riskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
limit_rate = #{limitRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
limit_ori = #{limitOri,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
flor_no = #{florNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
policy_dbgn = #{policyDbgn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
policy_dend = #{policyDend,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_reason = #{endReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mercno = #{mercno,jdbcType=CHAR},
where policy_no = #{policyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and endorse_no = #{endorseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and addr_no = #{addrNo,jdbcType=SMALLINT}

update fri_policy_dtl set addr_no_ori = #{addrNoOri,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, risk_no = #{riskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amt = #{amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, prem = #{prem,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, prop_addr = #{propAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zip_code = #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, useprop_code = #{usepropCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, useprop_name = #{usepropName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, const_class = #{constClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, limit_no = #{limitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, limit = #{limit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, amt_flt = #{amtFlt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, prem_flt = #{premFlt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, amt_fix = #{amtFix,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, prem_fix = #{premFix,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, amt_typ = #{amtTyp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, prem_typ = #{premTyp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, amt_ear = #{amtEar,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, prem_ear = #{premEar,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, risk_flag = #{riskFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, risk_name = #{riskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, limit_rate = #{limitRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, limit_ori = #{limitOri,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, flor_no = #{florNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, policy_dbgn = #{policyDbgn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, policy_dend = #{policyDend,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_reason = #{endReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mercno = #{mercno,jdbcType=CHAR} where policy_no = #{policyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and endorse_no = #{endorseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and addr_no = #{addrNo,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
